radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse isodense sellar enlargement with upward displacement into the suprasellar space.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative MRI showed significant resolution of the lesion; however, 6 months later, there was recurrence of the lesion.

radiographic_examinations.findings: 1-cm inhomogeneous lesion suggestive of a cyst.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The size of the lesion did not regress on repeat MRI two years later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Complete resolution of the pituitary lesion.
